h2_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: Just like the first phase, the key to this fight is attacking when you have your Focus Points built up and not trying to finish light combos. He'll typically interrupt them or use his perfect dodge to hurt you in the process, so it's best to wait until you can land those heavy attacks. It's also important to note him during his Rock Solid phase! Otherwise, you'll see the Destined One kicked around by the Great Sage's duplicates.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Great_Sage's_Broken_Shell.md', within the main section titled 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell', specifically from the subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Just like the first phase, the key to this fight is attacking when you have your Focus Points built up and not trying to finish light combos. He'll typically interrupt them or use his perfect dodge to hurt you in the process, so it's best to wait until you can land those heavy attacks. It's also important to note him during his Rock Solid phase! Otherwise, you'll see the Destined One kicked around by the Great Sage's duplicates.
